message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that will surely meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12000 is a great price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking more along the lines of $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $13500?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $14000. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $13000?

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $13250. This is as close to your offer as I can get without losing money on the deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. Would you be willing to consider $12900?

I understand that you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much money on the deal. I can offer you the product for $13000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate all your concessions, Alice, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. This is my final offer.
